reviewText:
Love this DVD . Such positive messages !!
My kids love it , and yes the animation is crappy ... But kids don't care , adults do .
It's a kids video - from the 80s redone . Love it !!!!

The ANIMATION WAS DONE WITH A LOW BUDGET...VERY CREEPY, AND VERY SCARY FOR LITTLE KIDS.
I BELIEVE THE CLASSICS SHOULD BE REDONE IN GOOD 3D ANIMATION.
THE AMAZING TORAH BIKE ANIMATED VIDEO (WHICH IS HARD TO FIND) IS ALSO VERY DISTURBING.
I DO RECOMMEND LISTENING TO THEM THOUGH...
